item.title: Dogs in the Dawghouse
item.description: ## # A tibble: 38 × 4 ## variable type role source ## <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> ## 1 game_id numeric ID original ## 2 game_date date ID original ## 3 team_short_display_name nominal ID original ## 4 opponent_short_display_name nominal ID original ## 5 season numeric ID original ## 6 team_rolling_orb numeric predictor original ## 7 team_rolling_drb numeric predictor original ## 8 opponent_rolling_orb numeric predictor original ## 9 opponent_rolling_drb numeric predictor original ## 10 team_cumulative_o_eff numeric predictor original ## # … with 28 more rows ## # A tibble: 2 × 3 ## .
